title: Criminal Justice Part 2 of 5 WS PDTV DIVX
description:
[img]http://www.bbc.co.uk/drama/content/images/2008/06/09/criminaljusticelead_396x222.jpg[/img]

Criminal Justice
Tue 1 Jul, 9:00 pm - 10:00 pm 60mins

2/5. It&#039;s Ben&#039;s first days in jail and he has unwittingly made a deadly enemy. As he struggles to find a way to simply survive, his legal team have struck a deal with the prosecution widely regarded as the best of all possible deals - but Ben will have to lie about the events of the fatal evening. Ben relies on the advice of his junior counsel Frances on whether to take that morally dubious step. Contains some strong language. [AD,S]
